original_text: Then Jesus began to speak God's message to people. He said, ‘You have done many wrong things. You must turn away from them and change how you live. Do this now, because the kingdom of heaven has come very near.’
korean_text: 이 때부터 예수께서 비로소 전파하여 이르시되 회개하라 천국이 가까이 왔느니라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus began to speak God's message to people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님은 사람들에게 하나님의 메시지를 전하기 시작하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: You have done many wrong things.
You must turn away from them
because the kingdom of heaven has come very near.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 천국이 매우 가까이 왔기 때문이다.
